label: SpecifiedCondition
comment: A state, such as of a specified person or thing.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying an action for this specified condition.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
A calibrated measurement specified for this specified condition.
A code specifying a subject type for this licence.
A measure of a value for this document characteristic.

referencedBy.comment: A stated condition of these transported dangerous goods.
